import java.io.BufferedReader;
import java.io.IOException;
import java.io.InputStreamReader;

public class Main{
	public static void main(String args[]) throws IOException,NumberFormatException{
			int max=1000000;
			double ans=0;
			double fact[]=new double[1000002];
			fact[0]=0;
			for(int i=1;i<=max;i++)
				fact[i]=fact[i-1]+Math.log(i);
			/*ans=Math.exp(fact[1000000]-fact[500000]-fact[500000]-((1000000-1)*Math.log(2)));
			ans=Math.floor(ans*1000000.0)/1000000.0;
			System.out.println(ans); */
			BufferedReader br=new BufferedReader(new InputStreamReader(System.in));
			String test=br.readLine();
			int tc=Integer.parseInt(test);
			for(int i=0;i<tc;i++)
			{
				int n,k;
				String str[]=br.readLine().split(" ");
				//n=br.read();  k=br.read();
				n=Integer.parseInt(str[0]); k=Integer.parseInt(str[1]);
				double divide,exponant,sum=0;
				divide=(n-1)*Math.log(2);
				for(int j=0;j<=Math.min(k,n-k);j++)
				{
					exponant=Math.exp(fact[n]-fact[n-j]-fact[j]-divide);
					sum+=exponant;
				}
				sum*=100;
				sum=Math.round(sum*10.0)/10.0;
				System.out.println(sum);
			}
	}
}
